1.title: Shrunken

12.content: You realize you were in the apartment of Rachel and Monica. Everything looked great and then begin to investigate the site. So...
12.title: Rachers and Monicas apartment

1211.content:
Looking around the giant apartment, you were simply amazed. You've never seen something so big, the biggest rooms you've been in would only be a dollhouse compared to this apartment. Everything looked so massive, you could only imagine what the giants who lived here would look like.

Fun enough, you wouldn't have to wait for long actually, as the door swung open as soon as you thought that. You watch as a giantess entered the room, walking in as you marvelled at her size, not being able to stand to see it, you fall straight on your ass.

The giant had long black hair, a beautiful face and a slender frame. Not to mention she was incredibly beautiful, she looked so wholesome and looked like the kind of girl you would try to hit on.

She was wearing casual clothes, obviously not intending company. Thats not to say she looked bad, just... casual. The giantess walked in, looking through the mail in her hands. Since she wasn't looking down at the floor, you soon realised that you were in danger. Moving fast you tried to get to anywhere you can to avoid her giant stomping feet. They come closer and closer as you see her giant frame over you. She brought her foot down and you just narrowly dodged it, seeing the wall of flesh that was this beautiful girls foot. She walked past you and into the dining area, placing the mail onto the giant table. She then sat down at it as she began opening.

Looking in the distance you see her sitting as this was your chance. Wanting to try to get her attention when she's stationary and sitting rather then getting her attention when she's close to stomping you into the apartment floor.

Moving across the giant apartment you became amazed. How did she move over this so fast? Are you really that small? Its just a few steps for her but for you it was at least a full time run. Even more reason to get this girls attention.

After a while you arrived under the table. Staring up at her you couldn't see what she was doing, nor did you really care. You just want her to look down. Since climbing her is incredibly dangerous and you don't want to risk it, your best idea is getting her attention down below. Which means your gonna have to go to the giant feet that almost snuffed you out before.

Walking under the table, you arrive just in front of her giant feet, her giant.... sexy feet.

You've never considered that you had a foot fetish, but looking at these killers you just might. Your calling them killers because you know for a fact that they can easily kill you without the girl even noticing. You need to be careful from now on.  Although looking at those feet, you might not want to get found out right now. Maybe you can have a little fun with them before you get her attention.  As long as she doesn't know, its no problem. Right?
1211.title: Enter Monica Gellar

info.brief_description: You find urself shrunken in one of the FRIENDS apartment's.
info.description:
You can be urself or one of the FRIENDS characters. U will shrink in one of the characters appartments.
In This story everything goes. But do not kill characters. This story is based somewhere on 4-5 seasons.

characters:

Ross Geller: Geekish 28 years old male with black hair, likes to research bug's.
Monica Geller: Rosses little sister 26. Black hair and is very dominant control freak.
Phoebe buffay: 28 blonde female. Can be very wierd and believes in magics, spirits and stuff like that.
Joey Tribbiani: Stupid, childish but good looking black haired guy 27 whos also italian. He likes to play with toys.
Chandler Bing: (Most likely gay) Brown haired guy 29 who jokes pretty much all the time.
Rachel Greene: Sometimes little stupid , spoiled blonde but still pretty nice person usually. She is 26 years old and Monicas best friend, and also fashion freak.
